data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: When you're backed against the wall, break the goddamn thing down.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: You always have a choice

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: You do what they say or they shoot you, right? Wrong! You take the gun. You pull out a bigger gun or you call their bluff or you do one of another 146 other things.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: The only time success comes before work is in the dictionary.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: 97% of people who gave up are emploted by the 3% who never gave up.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Anyone can do my job, but no one can be me.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Work unitl you no longer have to introduce yourself.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Winners don't make excuses when the other side plays the game.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Winners don't make excuses when the other side plays the game.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: I don't have dreams, I have goals.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: I belive in work. I don't fuck with luck.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: I don't get lucky. I make my own luck.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: It's going to happen because I'm going to make it happen.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Tou want to change your life? Change the way you think.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Life has two rules: 1. never quit 2.always remember rule #1

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: You're never going to win big if you're only going to minimise your losses.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: That's the difference between you and me. You wanna lose small, I wanna win big.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Time is free, but it's priceless. You can't own it, but you can use it. You can't keep it, but you can spend it. Once you've lost it, you can never get it back.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Don't raise your voice. Improve your argument.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: If you write Midnight Train to Georgia, you don't just sing it once.

data.author: Harvey Specter
data.quote: Let them hate. Just make sure they spell your name right.
